channel.title: Abouts on Lionel Tay
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Lionel Tay

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Lionel, nice to meet you. -- Data Analyst / Inquisitive / Problem Solver / Pragmatic / Organised I have keen interests in creative, cognitive, and quantitative challenges. As an analyst, I often curious and question about various subjects, processes, and outcomes. I understand the significance of practicality. Advising a well-defined action is just as important as insight mining. I’m an organised person. I track my studies and activities to keep my productivity and routine in check with scrum and other methods.
